scripts.install:poetry: poetry install --no-root || echo 'Poetry not found. Please install Poetry: https://python-poetry.org/docs/#installation'
scripts.dev: poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload || echo 'Poetry dependencies not installed. Run: pnpm --filter @nova/fastapi-svc install:poetry'
scripts.lint: poetry run black . && poetry run isort . && poetry run mypy .
